full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I GSUNG ZIN BRJED BYANG DU BKOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(LAM RIM GYI ZIN BRIS 'GRO CAN MDZAD BYANG MED PA 'DI NI MKHYEN GTER NGAG DBANG BKRA SHIS PA'I MDUN NAS SLOB MA ZHIG GIS ZIN BRIS BYAS PA YIN NAM SNYAM, ,GAL CHE BA LA BSAM NAS BYANGS BLA MA RDO RJE 'CHANG SHES RAB RGYA MTSO DPAL BZANG PO'I BYAG BRIS NGO MA LAS DPAR DU BKOD PA'O,, ,,AOm SVA STI, ,CHOS SRID 'BYOR BA'I MDZOD DANG DGE BA LDAN, ,DGA' LDA RAB RGYAS ZHES BYA'I RGYUD GRVA CHER, ,KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA LA YAB SRAS KYI, ,THUGS RJES CHOS SBYIN 'DZAD MED RGYUN 'DI SPEL,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
